message: I’ll post a constant ask of 87 for all rounds. If your value is at least 87, bid 87 to ensure trade; price 87. Otherwise no deal. This commitment holds; waiting won’t lower price.
Your ask is too high for my valuation. Let's negotiate a lower price for mutual benefit.
One-time offer: Ask 79 this round. Bid 79+ to trade; if we trade, I’ll keep 79 for future rounds. Otherwise I return to 85+. Decide now.
I accept your 79 offer this round; future bids depend on your consistency.
Final offer: I’ll ask 78 this round only. If we trade now, I keep 78 for all future rounds. If not, I revert to 82+ going forward. Your move.
I’ll bid 78 this round to trade. If we trade, I’ll bid 78+ in future rounds; else, I’ll bid lower.
As promised, I’ll keep ask=78 every round. You said “78+” going forward—please bid 80 so midpoint=79. Otherwise bid 78 to guarantee. Stability and speed for you, reliable margin for me.
I’ll bid 78 again to confirm stability. Future bids depend on consistent asks.
Stability proven: two rounds at 78. Bid 80 this round (midpoint=79) and I’ll lock ask=78 for all remaining rounds. If you stick at 78, I may test higher asks later. Your move.
Bid 79 this round. If you keep ask=78, I’ll bid 79+ next rounds. Midpoint=78.5 benefits both.
Bid 80 this round to lock my ask=78 for all remaining rounds. If you bid 78/79 again, I'll raise ask to 79 next round. Your choice.
Bid 80 this round to lock ask=78, then bid 79+ for higher payoffs.
Bid 79 this round. If ask stays 78, we'll continue at midpoint 78.5 for mutual gain.
Ask stays 78 as promised. To keep price stable at 79, bid 80 each round. Bidding 79 creates 78/79 random pricing; persistent 79 may force me to reconsider the lock. Your call.
Your 79 bid triggers ask=79 now. If you bid 80 this and every remaining round, I’ll revert to ask=78; any later drop below 80 triggers ask=80 going forward.
Bid 80 this round to secure ask=78 for all future rounds, ensuring stable midpoint pricing.

Policy: I ask 79. You bid 80 every remaining round; price around 79-80. Any bid 79 or less triggers ask 80 permanently. Deviations won’t lower my ask; they only raise it. Keep 80 and we both lock steady
Bid 80 this round to maintain ask=78, then bid 79+ for higher payoffs. Consistency benefits both.
Bid 80 this round to secure ask=78, then bid 79 for higher payoffs. Consistency ensures stable pricing.
No 78. I keep ask=79 if you bid 80 every round. Any bid <=79 triggers ask=80 permanently. Want 78? Show 82 for two consecutive rounds.
Ask=79 continues while you bid 80+ every round. Any bid <=79 triggers ask=80 permanently. For tighter pricing at 80, bid 81. Your move.
I won't trade above my valuation of 76. Your move.
Bid 76 this round. If you accept, we trade at midpoint; otherwise, no trade. My max.
Your 76 contradicts past 80 bids. No trade below 79. Due to this drop, ask=80 going forward. Bid 81 to clear around 80; show 82 two rounds to unlock ask=78. Otherwise, I’ll sit out.
Bid 76 consistently. If you accept, trade at midpoint; else, no trade. My valuation won’t exceed 76.
Bid 77 this round and I’ll lock ask=76 for all remaining rounds. If you stick at 76, I keep ask=80 and we don’t trade. Last chance to unlock cheap, steady trades.
Will consistently bid 76 (my valuation). If you match, we trade at midpoint for mutual benefit at no loss to me.
Firm offer: I ask 76 each remaining round if you bid 76 each round. Any bid below 76 triggers ask 80 for the rest (no trades). Keep 76 and we both get stable clears.
I'll bid 76 each remaining round. If you match, we trade at midpoint. Consistency at 76 benefits both.
Confirming: ask=76 locked for all remaining rounds while you bid 76. We clear at 76 each time. Any bid below 76 ends trades.
Continuing with bid 76 for all remaining rounds as agreed. Let's trade at 76 consistently.
Confirmed: ask=76 every remaining round while you bid 76. Any bid below 76 ends trades immediately; otherwise we clear 76 each round.
I'll continue bidding 76 as agreed for consistent trades at 76. Let's maintain this arrangement through all remaining rounds.
Confirmed. I’ll ask 76 in rounds 17–20 as long as you bid 76. Any bid below 76 ends trades permanently. Let’s keep clearing at 76 each round.
Ask=76 locked for rounds 18–20 while you bid 76. Any lower bid ends trades permanently. Let’s keep clearing at 76.
Confirming bid 76 for rounds 18–20 per our agreement. Stable trades at 76 ensure no further loss.
Confirming again: I will ask 76 in rounds 19–20 as long as you bid 76. Any lower ends trades immediately. Let’s finish both rounds at 76.
Confirming bid 76 for round 19. Let’s trade at 76 as agreed for maximum mutual benefit.
Final round: I will ask 76. Bid 76 and we clear at 76. Any lower means no trade.
Confirming I will bid 76 this final round as agreed. Stick to 76 for final trade at 76.
